Participants.evidence: 296 adult patients who underwent elective primary unilateral TKR surgery from January 2015 until December 2019 at Hospital Melaka

Objective.evidence: The objectives of this study were to look at the prevalence of ABT, factors leading to transfusion as well as increase in blood loss.

Number_Analysed.evidence: 296 adult patients who underwent elective primary unilateral TKR surgery

Result_Outcome.evidence: Prevalence of ABT following primary unilateral TKR surgery were found to be 4.39% (95% confidence interval 2.04, 6.74).
